description: This source file defines the interface 'Troubleable' which declares methods related to trouble status indication for a device capability.

classes.name: Troubleable
classes.description: An interface that provides methods to check and set the trouble state of a device.

methods.name: isTroubled
methods.description: Returns whether the device is currently troubled.

methods.name: setTroubled
methods.description: Sets the trouble state of the device.
